post:
[SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net "SmallWeb") is your one-stop solution for DirectAdmin hosting. Whether you're looking to host your own projects or resell our services to customers we've got it all - without milking you for profit.

Try our services in Amsterdam, Los Angeles, Luxembourg, London, Melbourne, New York or Singapore.


**Budget Hosting:**
- Available in 7 locations
- DirectAdmin 
- CloudLinux
- Let's Encrypt
- Softaculous
- NVMe/SSD
- Lower LVE Limits
- Limited Domains
- 100GB Bandwidth
- Support via Ticket
- Node.JS Support
- Python Support


**¼GB** (1 Site) -  £1.99/year
**½GB** (2 Sites) -  £2.99/year
**1GB** (5 Sites) - £5.99/year
**2GB** (10 Sites) - £9.99/year

[Choose a location here!](https://smallweb.net/order/main/index/budget "Choose a location here!")


---

**Shared Hosting:**
- Available in 7 locations
- DirectAdmin 
- CloudLinux
- Let's Encrypt
- Softaculous
- NVMe/SSD
- Increased LVE Limits
- Unlimited Domains
- Unmetered Bandwidth 
- Support via Ticket
- Caged SSH Access
- Node.JS Support
- Python Support


**5GB** (∞ Sites) - £1.99/month
**10GB** (∞ Sites) - £2.99/month


[Choose a location here!](https://smallweb.net/order/main/index/shared "Choose a location here!")
